mapper.insert: insert into dish (name, price, image_url, category, restaurant_id, flavour) values (#{name}, #{price}, #{imageUrl}, #{category}, #{restaurantId}, #{flavour, typeHandler=zrgj.order_everyday.handler.JacksonTypeHandler})
mapper.update: update dish set name=#{name}, price=#{price}, image_url=#{imageUrl}, category=#{category}, flavour=#{flavour, typeHandler=zrgj.order_everyday.handler.JacksonTypeHandler} where id = #{id}
